servlets

Class RouteServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • servlets.RouteServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/RouteServlet")
public class RouteServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet implementation class RouteServlet - This servlet is responsible for reading route data from the database, creating new entries, deleting and updating entries
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • read

        private static java.lang.String read(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.lang.String maxTime,
                                     double minRating,
                                     int maxNoStops,
                                     double boundNorthWestLat,
                                     double boundNorthWestLong,
                                     double boundSouthEastLat,
                                     double boundSouthEastLong,
                                     java.lang.Integer owner)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to read route data from the database
        Parameters:
        em - {EntityManager} - EntityManager manages database operations
        type - {String} - Type of Location (must be "Kultur" or "Party")
        maxTime - {String} - Maximum time that the routes selected should have
        minRating - {Integer} - Minimal rating that the routes selected should have
        maxNoStops - {Integer} - Maximum number of stops that the routes selected should have
        boundNorthWestLat - {Double} - Latitude of upper left corner of the map
        boundNorthWestLong - {Double} - Longitude of upper left corner of the map
        boundSouthEastLat - {Double} - Latitude of lower right corner of the map
        boundSouthEastLong - {Double} - Longitude of lower right corner of the map
        Returns:
        {String} - JSONData with found routes; if no entries are found it returns an empty array []
        Throws:
        - - Exception if type is null
        - - Exception if type is neither "Kultur" nor "Party"
        java.lang.Exception

      • create

        private static java.lang.String create(java.util.List<Route> routes,
                                       javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to create new routes in the database
        Parameters:
        routes - {List} - List of routes that should be created
        em - {EntityManager} - EntityManager manages database operations
        session - {HttpSession} - Needed to retrieve the user that creates the route
        Returns:
        {String} - "Success" if the routes are successfully created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                       javax.persistence.EntityManager em)

        Method to delete routes from database
        Parameters:
        routes - {List} - List of routes that should be deleted
        em - {EntityManager} - EntityManager manages database operations
        Returns:
        {String} - "Success" if the routes are successfully deleted
        Throws:
        - - Exception if route doesn't exist
        java.lang.Exception
